meanings.definition: Stotting: to bounce or leap high in the air
meanings.sent1: The playful kitten was stotting around the garden.
meanings.sent2: The deer was stotting gracefully through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo was stotting so high, it almost touched the clouds!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was stotting with excitement as she approached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The basketball seemed to be stotting with energy as it bounced on the court.

meanings.definition: Stotting: the act of bouncing or leaping high in the air
meanings.sent1: The stotting of the gazelle caught the attention of the safari tourists.
meanings.sent2: The graceful stotting of the antelope was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo's stotting was so impressive that even the other animals stopped to watch.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's movements had a stotting quality, making the performance mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The joyous stotting of the children in the playground filled the air with laughter.
